question: How many team members can I invite?
answer: You can invite up to a maximum of 6 team members.

question: What is the maximum file upload size?
answer: No more than 2GB. All files in your account must fit your allocated storage space.

question: How do I reset my password?
answer: On the log in page click the link to reset password and answer the security questions.

question: Can I cancel my subscription?
answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Go to My Account > Handle My Subscription.

question: Do you provide additional support?
answer: Live web chat support is available Mon - Fri 9AM till 5PM. If you wish to contact us outside of these times please email us at support@accordion.com
